```
for i in img*
do convert tiff:$i $i.png
done
```

```
for i in *
do convert $i ${i%jpg}gif
done
```

```
convert image.jpg -background Khaki
  label:'Label' -gravity Center
  -append labeled-image.jpg
```

```
for i in *
do convert $i -background Khaki
   label:"${i%.jpg}" -gravity
   Center -append labeled-$i
done
```
